Uses of Package
metaface.server

Packages that use metaface.server

metaface.server   
 

Classes in metaface.server used by metaface.presynthesise
VHMLParser
          This class is used to construct an eXtensible Markup Language (XML) parser for a Virtual Human Markup Language (VHML)document.
 

Classes in metaface.server used by metaface.server
HTTPServerListener
          Used by the server to listen for messages from the HTTPClient Copyright (c) 1996,1997,1998 Sun Microsystems, Inc.
MetaFaceHTTPServer
          Implementation of a basic HTTP server for Firewall tunneling.
MetaFaceService
          This class provides the basis for client services.
Pool
          Implements Thread Pooling.
VHMLFAElement
          This class stores a VHML Facial Animation Element for recall when rendering MPEG-4 FAPs
VHMLReader
          This class is used to parse a Virtual Human Markup Language (VHML)document.
VHMLSemantics
          This class is designed to interpret VHML facial elements and render using MPEG-4 FAPs.
Worker
          An interface for worker threads to adhere to Copyright (c) 1996,1997,1998 Sun Microsystems, Inc.
WorkerThread
          Handler class for perform work requested by the Pool.
